With 15 years of experience in web application design and development, I excel in building scalable applications using frameworks like Angular, React, Express, and FastAPI. My focus is on creating intuitive user interfaces and efficient backend architectures. Thank you.

projects.title: ML Configurator
projects.description:
This app allows Data scientists to experiment with various machine learning models, Tune hyperparameters to optimize model performance, and visualize key performance indicators (KPIs) for each experiment before finding the best fit model for specific business use case.

I am responsible for designing architectural changes, developing the angular frontend and BFF APIs, writing unit and integration tests, containerizing the application with Docker, and deploying it to Kubernetes. The challenge I tackled was migrating this app to Kubernetes.

I successfully moved it from CloudFront and Lambda, deployed it to Kubernetes as a Knative service. This resulted in faster transaction times and reduced costs.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
